title: S17 Ep45: God, The Devil, and Me w/ Valerie Georgeson
itunes:title: God, The Devil, and Me w/ Valerie Georgeson
description:
Darkness Radio presents God, The Devil, and Me with extreme haunting survivor/Author, Valerie Georgeson!

An innocent seeker of God, Valerie had strayed into an Indian sect where it's female guru, learning of her vocation to 'write a book for God'feared her as a potential whistleblower. In the process of writing the book, the guru would be outed as something completely unexpected, Valerie would turn to Catholicism, barely escape with her life, be pursued and turn to Catholicism, and lives ruined in the process... with one incredibly happy twist,,,Â 

Get you copy of God, The Devil, and Me here: https://www.johnhuntpublishing.com/o-books/our-books/god-devil-me

Listen to Valerie's radio program here: https://rcf.fr/vie-spirituelle/espace-spirituel-anglophone

See Valerie's blog here: gd-m.blogspot.com

Darkness Radio has partnered with the UFO Disclosure Symposium in late May! Be part of this newsworthy conference and get your tickets here: https://ufodisclosuresymposium.com/?ref=tim%40darknessradio.com
